content: Here's some fun facts about me: üëã Heya, this is Suyog. üëÄ I adore Books, Places and Astrophysics. üå± I research on using Machine Learning for Gravitational-Wave detection. üíª I have experience in Data Analysis, Numerical Solvers and Deep Neural Nets. üíûÔ∏è Would be awesome to collaborate on a computational project. üì´ Catch up about my work on this website. Timeline The University of Tokyo 2023 ~ PhD in Physics at RESCEU The University of Tokyo 2021 ‚Äì 2023 MSc in Physics at ICRR TIFR, Mumbai 2020/11 ‚Äì 2021/04 Project Associate in the Helioseismology lab IIITDM Kancheepuram, Chennai 2016 ‚Äì 2020 BTech in Mechanical Engineering, Design and Manufacturing Montfort School, Mandla 2002 ‚Äì 2016 High School Graduation, majoring in Science Thank you for visiting my page! :)
summary:
Here's some fun facts about me:

  • üëã Heya, this is Suyog.
  • üëÄ I adore Books, Places and Astrophysics.
  • üå± I research on using Machine Learning for Gravitational-Wave detection.
  • üíª I have experience in Data Analysis, Numerical Solvers and Deep Neural Nets.
  • üíûÔ∏è Would be awesome to collaborate on a computational project.
  • üì´ Catch up about my work on this website.

Timeline
title: About
CV/Resume

content:
[Academic] 2024Âπ¥10Êúà„Éº2025Âπ¥02Êúà I serve as a Teaching Assistant for the Graduate-level “Graviational-Wave Physics” Course ! (once again :)
[Talk] 2024Âπ¥08Êúà02Êó• Gave an invited talk at the “Eccentric Seminar” at Tokyo City University -> Slides
[Talk] 2024Âπ¥07Êúà06Êó• Presentation at the Department of Physics Open House for prospective International student at UTokyo -> Slides
[Talk] 2024Âπ¥06Êúà20Êó• Gave a talk at RESCEU-UTAP Thursday Seminar -> Slides
[Academic] 2024Âπ¥04Êúà„Äú I will be hosting the RESCEU-UTAP Thursday seminars starting next term !
[Poster] 2024Âπ¥03Êúà11„Éº14Êó• I will be participating in the LVK collaboration meeting at Louisiana State Univesity, Baton Rouge.
[Academic] 2024Âπ¥01Êúà16„Éº28Êó• Visited Prof Gopu’s lab in the Department of Astronomy at TIFR, Mumbai !
Older News [Academic] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà$\sim$ I am be one of the reviewers for the NRTidalv3 waveform model ! My contributions will be on Time Domain Behavior and Documentation.
[Part-time] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà07„Éº15Êó• Serving as a part-time worker during the RESCEU-NBIA workshop in the Hongo campus !
[Talk] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà07„Éº15Êó• I plan to submit present a talk on X-Ray Observations in the RESCEU-NBIA GW Workshop, at UTokyo, Hongo campus !
[Talk] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà04„Éº06Êó• Have a talk at the Gakujutsu-Henkaku Conference in Gero Onsen Sumeikan, Gifu !
[Poster] 2023Âπ¥11Êúà13„Éº18Êó• I will present a Poster in the MLPhys Conference at YITP, Kyoto University.
[Part-time] 2023Âπ¥11Êúà06„Éº09Êó• Tomonokai Junior High School Program at Mitaka !
[Talk] 2023Âπ¥10Êúà31Êó• I have a contributed talk at the RESCEU Symposium, UTokyo, Hongo.
[Academic] 2023Âπ¥10Êúà„Éº2024Âπ¥02Êúà I serve as a Teaching Assistant for the Graduate-level “Graviational-Wave Physics” Course ! (my first TAship :)
[Career] 2023Âπ¥10Êúà01Êó• Started PhD with Kipp-san at RESCEU, The University of Tokyo

[Poster] 2024Âπ¥03Êúà11„Éº14Êó• I will be participating in the LVK collaboration meeting at Louisiana State Univesity, Baton Rouge.
[Academic] 2024Âπ¥01Êúà16„Éº28Êó• Visited Prof Gopu’s lab in the Department of Astronomy at TIFR, Mumbai !
Older News [Academic] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà$\sim$ I am be one of the reviewers for the NRTidalv3 waveform model ! My contributions will be on Time Domain Behavior and Documentation.
[Part-time] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà07„Éº15Êó• Serving as a part-time worker during the RESCEU-NBIA workshop in the Hongo campus !
[Talk] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà07„Éº15Êó• I plan to submit present a talk on X-Ray Observations in the RESCEU-NBIA GW Workshop, at UTokyo, Hongo campus !
[Talk] 2023Âπ¥12Êúà04„Éº06Êó• Have a talk at the Gakujutsu-Henkaku Conference in Gero Onsen Sumeikan, Gifu !
[Poster] 2023Âπ¥11Êúà13„Éº18Êó• I will present a Poster in the MLPhys Conference at YITP, Kyoto University.
[Part-time] 2023Âπ¥11Êúà06„Éº09Êó• Tomonokai Junior High School Program at Mitaka !
[Talk] 2023Âπ¥10Êúà31Êó• I have a contributed talk at the RESCEU Symposium, UTokyo, Hongo.
[Academic] 2023Âπ¥10Êúà„Éº2024Âπ¥02Êúà I serve as a Teaching Assistant for the Graduate-level “Graviational-Wave Physics” Course ! (my first TAship :)
[Career] 2023Âπ¥10Êúà01Êó• Started PhD with Kipp-san at RESCEU, The University of Tokyo
summary:
